name: kapowarr
description: Kapowarr is a request manager and automation companion for comic book libraries. It integrates with downloaders and indexers to fetch issues, tracks series and requests, and provides a web UI for users to submit and monitor requests.
features: Automated Downloads: Automatically fetch new comic issues from configured sources. Keep your library up to date.
Series Tracking: Monitor ongoing series and automatically download new releases. Never miss an issue.
Indexer Integration: Connect to multiple comic indexers and search aggregators. Access vast comic catalogs.
Metadata Management: Fetch and organize comic metadata, cover art, and series information. Maintain rich library details.
Quality Profiles: Define preferred formats, resolutions, and file sizes for downloads. Control library quality.
Request System: Web interface for users to request comics and track fulfillment. Manage library additions collaboratively.
Download Client Support: Integrate with popular download clients for automated fetching. Seamless download workflow.
Library Organization: Automatic file renaming, folder structure, and organization. Keep comics neatly arranged.
Search & Filter: Find comics in your library with advanced search and filtering. Navigate large collections easily.
Calendar View: See upcoming comic releases and scheduled downloads. Plan library growth.
Notifications: Get alerts for new downloads, failed searches, and system events. Stay informed about library activity.
API Access: Programmatic control and integration with other automation tools. Extend functionality as needed.
